name: rollup-project

schema.title: Add Rollup Configuration to a project
schema.description: Add Rollup Configuration to a project.

project.x-prompt: What is the name of the project to set up a rollup for?

compiler.description: The compiler to use to build source.

main.description: Path relative to the workspace root for the main entry file. Defaults to '<projectRoot>/src/main.ts'.

tsConfig.description: Path relative to the workspace root for the tsconfig file to build with. Defaults to '<projectRoot>/tsconfig.app.json'.

skipValidation.description: Do not perform any validation on existing project.

importPath.description: The library name used to import it, like `@myorg/my-awesome-lib`.

external.description: A list of external modules that will not be bundled (`react`, `react-dom`, etc.).

rollupConfig.description: Path relative to workspace root to a custom rollup file that takes a config object and returns an updated config.

description: Add rollup configuration to a project.
